entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
